content: Investments Robo-Advisors PFF Panel 3 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by JovinAsked on 02 Mar 2019Will roboadvisors beat the normal TA and FA? Will the skillset we learn today be obsolete due to advances in technology?1 answerAnswerBump3

Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Apr 2019The market is already quite efficient without robos.In fact, robos aren't as efficient as people think. Stashaway is trying to beat the market to some degree, for example. I don't really think the skills you learn will have anything to do with their ETF strategies.0 comments0
